name: laser-paper-website
description: A website showcasing the paper titled 'LASER: A Neuro-Symbolic Framework for Learning Spatio-Temporal Scene Graphs with Weak Supervision.'
author: Jiani Huang, Ziyang Li, Mayur Naik, Ser-Nam Lim

scripts.deploy: next build && touch out/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d out --dotfiles
